message.name: ERR_ALLEGATION_MULTIPLEPARTICIPANTS_ENTERED
message.locale: Only one of case participant, registered participant or participant name may be entered for the participant details.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATION_SOURCE_MULTIPLEPARTICIPANTS_ENTERED
message.locale: Only one of case participant, registered participant or participant name may be entered for the source.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATION_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: Type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATION_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Allegation Date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATION_DATE_IN_FUTURE
message.locale: Allegation Date must be earlier than or equal to today's date.

message.name: ERR_SOURCE_PARTICIPANT_EMPTY
message.locale: Source participant must be entered if the source is not anonymous.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATION_PARTICIPANT_EMPTY
message.locale: An allegation participant must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SOURCE_DETAILS_ANONYMOUS_EMPTY
message.locale: Source details cannot be entered if the source is anonymous.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATION_ROLE_PARTICIPANT_EXIST
message.locale: The selected participant already exists with a role of '%1s'.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATION_NOT_DELETED
message.locale: The allegation cannot be deleted as the investigation case status is '%1s'.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATION_NOT_INSERTED
message.locale: The allegation cannot be created as the investigation case status is 'Closed'.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATION_NOT_MODIFIED
message.locale: The allegation cannot be modified as the investigation case status is '%1s'.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATIONROLE_NOT_MODIFIED
message.locale: The participant role cannot be modified as the allegation is cancelled.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATIONROLE_NOT_INSERTED
message.locale: The participant role cannot be created as the allegation is cancelled.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATION_PARTICIPANT_NOT_REMOVED
message.locale: This allegation participant cannot be removed as there must be at least one allegation participant for an allegation.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATION_XRV_CASE_REOPEN_FOR_MODIFY
message.locale: An allegation cannot be modified on an investigation that has been reopened.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATIONROLE_NOT_INSERTED_CASE
message.locale: The participant role cannot be inserted as the investigation case status is '%1s'.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATIONROLE_NOT_MODIFIED_CASE
message.locale: The participant role cannot be modified as the investigation case status is '%1s'.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATION_NOT_INSERTED_CASE
message.locale: You cannot add an allegation to an investigation once the investigation has been 'Submitted for Approval' or 'Approved'.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATIONROLE_XRV_CASE_REOPEN_FOR_MODIFY
message.locale: A participant role cannot be modified on an investigation that has been reopened.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATION_XRV_CASE_REOPEN_FOR_INSERT
message.locale: An allegation cannot be inserted on an investigation that has been reopened.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATIONROLE_XRV_CASE_REOPEN_FOR_INSERT
message.locale: An allegation role cannot be inserted on an investigation that has been reopened.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATION_XFV_CANCELLED_ALREADY
message.locale: An allegation cannot be cancelled as it is cancelled already.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATION_XFV_MODIFY_CANCELLED
message.locale: An allegation cannot be modified as it is cancelled.

message.name: ERR_ALLEGATION_ATTACHMENT_NOT_INSERTED
message.locale: The attachment cannot be created as the allegation is cancelled.
